## Data

The data consists of `r length(unique(d$country))` unique counties.


```{r}
pander(summary(d))
```


```{r}
m <- lm(lifeExp ~ continent + year + pop, data = d)

```


```{r, results='asis'}
stargazer(m, type = "html")
```
